One interesting thing is that if you go back in app, it exits the app rather than go back to the previous page so I wonder if that's just an issue with me.

One4Wall provides a vast collection of stunning high quality wallpapers with user-friendly interface, ensuring that they look great on any device. The app offers a curated selection of wallpapers based on popular themes, from abstract designs to nature landscapes and everything in between, ensuring that users always have access to a wallpaper that matches their unique style. The app’s interface is intuitive, and navigating through the various categories is a breeze.
